divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside, looked up, and could see a slowish moving white light. No sound, no vapor trail and no distinguising characteristics. I.e typical red, blue, green and white flashing lights. Flight path was direct but approximately 5 minutes after I observed it, the white light abruptly disappeared which seemed to be directly over O'Hare airport.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Addison
There were no other sightings in Addison on or around June 20th 2012
Summary: White light. Not a plane or Helo
